name: content
schema:
CREATE TABLE `content` (
	`id` text PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	`name` text NOT NULL,
	`slug` text NOT NULL,
	`description` text,
	`long_description` text,
	`version` text,
	`content_type` text NOT NULL,
	`status` text DEFAULT 'active',
	`target` text,
	`standard` text,
	`technology` text,
	`vendor` text,
	`maintainer` text,
	`github` text,
	`documentation_url` text,
	`reference_url` text,
	`readme_url` text,
	`readme_markdown` text,
	`control_count` integer,
	`stig_id` text,
	`benchmark_version` text,
	`automation_level` text,
	`is_featured` integer DEFAULT false,
	`featured_order` integer,
	`license` text,
	`release_date` integer,
	`deprecated_at` integer,
	`created_at` integer,
	`updated_at` integer,
	FOREIGN KEY (`target`) REFERENCES `targets`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE no action,
	FOREIGN KEY (`standard`) REFERENCES `standards`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE no action,
	FOREIGN KEY (`technology`) REFERENCES `technologies`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE no action,
	FOREIGN KEY (`vendor`) REFERENCES `organizations`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE no action,
	FOREIGN KEY (`maintainer`) REFERENCES `teams`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE no action
)
